name: The Diplomat Blazer
excerpt: Navy wool blend · Fully canvassed · Hand-finished lapels
description: A refined navy blazer with full canvassing, hand-finished lapels and subtle structure for the boardroom. Small-batch, handmade tailoring.

name: The Statesman Suit
excerpt: Charcoal worsted wool · Two-piece · Bespoke fits available
description: A classic two-piece suit in fine worsted wool with considered proportions and finishing, ideal for formal occasions and daily leadership wear.

name: Signature White Shirt
excerpt: 100% Egyptian cotton · Single-needle stitching · Collar options
description: Crisp, breathable Egyptian cotton with refined collars and single-needle stitching for a clean silhouette.

name: Executive Trousers
excerpt: Tailored fit · Mercerised finish for durability
description: Tailored trousers with a contemporary rise and tapered leg—cut for movement and polish.

name: Oxford Belt
excerpt: Full-grain leather · Hand-stitched · Polished brass buckle
description: A timeless full-grain leather belt with hand-stitched edges and a polished brass buckle.

name: Heritage Wallet
excerpt: Vegetable-tanned leather · Slim profile · Multiple card slots
description: Slim, elegantly finished wallet in vegetable-tanned leather. Ages beautifully with use.

name: Signature Silk Tie
description: Hand-rolled silk tie in curated shades to pair with our suits and blazers.

name: Linen Summer Blazer
description: A relaxed, breathable linen blazer for warmer months with unstructured shoulders.

name: Travel Suit
description: A modern suit engineered for travel—breathable, wrinkle-resistant and quick-drying.

name: Handmade Oxford Shoes
description: Classic Goodyear welted oxfords with a comfortable last and refined finishing.

name: Cashmere Scarf
description: Luxurious scarf knitted in a merino-cashmere blend for cool mornings.

name: Cotton Chinos
description: A versatile chino with tailored lines and a comfortable stretch for daily wear.
